uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

Class Items

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.Items

  • public class Items
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds ArrayLists of available pizzas, sides and drinks. Loads and saves the ArrayLists using XML files (Pizzas.xml, Sides.xml, Drinks.xml). If the XML is not found, it adds default examples.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Items() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<GeneralItem> getDrinks()
      Gets drinks ArrayList.
      java.util.ArrayList<GeneralItem> getPizzas()
      Gets pizzas ArrayList.
      java.util.ArrayList<GeneralItem> getSides()
      Gets sides ArrayList.
      void load()
      Loads pizzas, sides, and drinks from XML files to ArrayLists
      void loadAndSaveDefaults()
      Adds example pizzas, sides, and drinks to ArrayLists, then saves to new XML files.
      void save()
      Saves pizzas, sides, drinks ArrayLists to Pizzas.xml, Sides.xml, and Drinks.xml files.

      • loadAndSaveDefaults

        public void loadAndSaveDefaults()
        Adds example pizzas, sides, and drinks to ArrayLists, then saves to new XML files. Should be used when XML files can not be found.
        See Also:
        save()

      • save

        public void save()
        Saves pizzas, sides, drinks ArrayLists to Pizzas.xml, Sides.xml, and Drinks.xml files.
